prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon with three heads, showcasing vibrant orange and brown feathers.
I want a Pokemon that can sprint across grasslands, featuring striking orange plumage and three beaks.
Generate a Normal-type Pokemon with a sleek body shape, known for its speed and agility.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, with unique traits like multiple heads and bright colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that can fly and run fast, characterized by its orange and brown color scheme.
Design a Pokemon with three heads that can quickly adapt to various habitats, including forests and grasslands.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies speed and teamwork, featuring an eye-catching orange and pink design.
